snippet: Peter Doig, who is accused of falsely denying that he painted an acrylic landscape as a young man in Canada, took the stand in a Chicago courtroom....
abstract: Artist Peter Doig testifies in federal lawsuit brought by former correction officer Robert Fletcher, who claims acrylic landscape he owns was painted by Doig; denies having made painting, which Fletcher had hoped to sell at auction for millions of dollars.
lead_paragraph: Peter Doig, who is accused of falsely denying that he painted an acrylic landscape as a young man in Canada, took the stand in a Chicago courtroom.
